name: Space Wave (sermmor)
description:
What is it?

A little project that I made developed in C++ with Unreal Engine 4 for Expert Course in Video Games Developer (CEDV) of UCLM. Made with Unreal Engine 4. Simple shoot 'em up minigame based in old school shoot 'em up like Aero Fighters.

So this is a simple space ship shoot 'em up' minigame for 1, 2 or 3 players. You have to destroy everything you can.

Controls Mouse controller

You can move the mouse for move the spaceship. Left clic for shoot.

Keyboard

AWSD for move, J for fire.

Xbox 360 gamepad

Left stick for move spaceship, RT for shoot. Vibration always is ON.

Credits
  • Music: Cybercop 1984 of ROBERT80Z (Creative Commons). You could listening on jamendo.
  • Art, design, sound and programming by Sergio Martín ( @sermmor).
